== Porkulam (CT) (627775) ==

Porkulam (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.82 sq. km. and harbouring 1571 households with total population of 6503 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 335 km. Male population is 3123 and female population is 3380. Scheduled Caste population is 1113 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the town is 627775<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 95 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 15 km.
